welcome: 👋 Hello *:name*, welcome! Send the link of the video/music you want to download:
invalid_link:
⚠️ Please send a valid YouTube/Music link.
Example: `https://music.youtube.com/watch?v=hqGOsVJ7hWg`
time_exceeded: ⚠️ The video is longer than :minute minutes!
error_get_qualities: ❌ An error occurred while getting the list of qualities.
expire_link_cache: ⌛️ Video has expired, please send the link again!
downloading_progress:
📥 Downloading... :progress% | :megabytes

Boost the speed of your downloads, become a VIP by [joining the channel](https://t.me/HellFiveOsbornCanal).
error_upload: ❌ An error occurred while uploading the media!
process_exceeded:
You already have :count download processes in the queue.
Please wait for them to finish.
in_process: ⏳ Already in progress, please wait for completion!
share_link: https://t.me/share/url?url=https://t.me/:username&text=📥 Download videos/music with Youtube Music Bot
help:
🎵 *Youtube Music Bot - Music and Video Download* 📽️

With the Youtube Music Bot, you can do the following:

— *Download High-Quality Music:* Download your favorite tracks from YouTube Music in high-quality audio.

— *Download Videos in MP4/MKV:* Download YouTube videos in MP4 or MKV video formats.

— *Download Videos and Convert to MP3/M4A:* Turn videos into audio files in MP3 or M4A format.

Additionally:

✨ *Become a VIP:* Join the @HellFiveOsbornCanal channel to become a VIP and speed up your downloads.

⏰ *Duration Limit:* Currently, you can download videos with a maximum duration of 12 minutes.

✂️ *Process Cleanup:* Use the /kill command to terminate all ongoing processes.

🌐 *Change Language:* Change the bot's language anytime with the /lang command.

Enjoy the Youtube Music Bot to download and enjoy your favorite music and videos! 🎶📺
